title: An all-in-one free-standing single-ion conducting semi-solid polymer electrolyte for high-performance practical Li metal batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02208D, Paper
Jinping Zhang, Jie Zhu, Ruiqi Zhao, Jie Liu, Xingchen Song, Nuo Xu, Yansong Liu, Hongtao Zhang, Xiangjian Wan, Yanfeng Ma, Chenxi Li, Yongsheng Chen
A single-ion conducting solid polymer electrolyte with enhanced Li+ migration by controlling anion immobilization and solvation was developed, showcasing superior electrochemical performance and industrial compatibility.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
